update crm_install_bill
sales_org_short = #{salesOrgShort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_type = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
po_number_sold = #{poNumberSold,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

appoint_end_date = #{appointEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
client_addr = #{clientAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

client_phone = #{clientPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

receipt_name = #{receiptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

finish_status = #{finishStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

inner_machine_code = #{innerMachineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bill_type = #{billType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
installation_type = #{installationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
longitude = #{longitude},
latitude = #{latitude}
where jl_order_num = #{jlOrderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: SELECT sales_org_short xszz, po_number_sold thdh, bill_status djzt, appoint_date yysj, appoint_start_date yysj_s, appoint_end_date yysj_e, client_addr khdz, client_name khxm, client_phone khdh, gome_order_addr jdwd, good_code spbm, good_name spmc, jl_order_num azdh FROM crm_install_bill WHERE order_worker_big = #{userId} OR order_worker_litter = #{userId}

SELECT b.`jl_order_num` azdh,d.`baidu_id` baiduId,d.`access_token` accessToken FROM crm_install_bill b LEFT JOIN sh_device_manage d ON b.`order_worker_big` = d.`user_id` OR b.order_worker_litter = d.`user_id` WHERE b.jl_order_num IN (SELECT jl_order_num FROM crm_install_bill WHERE DATE_FORMAT( appoint_start_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H')>=#{qyeryTime} AND bill_status = 'E0010')
mapper.update: UPDATE crm_install_bill SET appoint_date = #{yysj}, appoint_start_date = #{appointStartDate}, appoint_end_date = #{appointEndDate} WHERE jl_order_num = #{azd01}
